bio: far.quest helped over 100,000 people learn about Farcaster, built on Optimism
impactDescription:
We helped over 100,000 unique people learn about Farcaster, and contributed to over 2,000 onchain Optimism transactions in 11 days once Farcaster went permissionless.

We also helped people build on Farcaster through our free open-source Farcaster APIs, and through our tutorials on how to run a Farcaster hub for half the cost of the official guides.
contributionDescription:
far.quest helped over 100,000 unique people around the world learn about Farcaster, a decentralized social network built on Optimism (https://farcaster.xyz).

When our users registered on Farcaster through us, or logged in through our client at https://far.quest/cast, they interacted directly with Optimism.

We also helped developers build on Farcaster, we offered free and open-source Farcaster APIs (https://docs.wield.co/farcaster/api), and teached users how to run a Farcaster hub for half the cost of the official guides (https://docs.wield.co/farcaster/hubs).

contributionLinks.description: Our Proxy Contract for Farcaster Accounts: ~2,100 OP transactions in 11 days
far.quest's landing page, promoted Farcaster which heavily utilizes Optimism
We provided Free Open-Source Farcaster APIs running on Optimism
We teached people how to run Farcaster Hubs running on Optimism

impactMetrics.description: far.quest unique users in 2023Q4 so far

fundingSources.description: Revenue on Optimism, Farcaster Proxy Contract
